DOC.brief_title: Delayed Nausea Vomiting Patients With Colorectal Cancer Receiving Oxaliplatin
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To assess prevalence delay nausea vomit patient colorectal cancer receive standard anti-emetic medication first course oxaliplatin-based chemotherapy regimen ( mFOLFOX6 FOLFOX7 ) . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo collection demographic , diagnostic , treatment data baseline . Patients complete Functional Living Index-Emesis ( FLIE ) questionnaire baseline prior first chemotherapy infusion 5-7 day . Patients also fill daily patient diary symptoms nausea vomiting , use medication prevent symptoms day 1-5 .
